    - heading "PLAN" [ref=e107] [level=3]
    - paragraph: Accommodation Plan
    - paragraph: For tourism and business. At Villa Fontaine, we offer a variety of accommodations tailored to your style. We offer flexible and great value accommodation plans. Don't miss out on our limited-time special offers.
    - heading "ABOUT" [ref=e108] [level=3]
    - paragraph: The appeal of Villa Fontaine Grand Haneda Airport
      - listitem:
        - heading "Direct access to Haneda Airport Terminal 3 AIRPORT" [ref=e109] [level=4]
        - paragraph: Shopping, restaurants, and natural hot springs A comfortable approach that connects everything, including the bus terminal
        - link "MORE" [ref=e110]:
          - /url: https://www.shopping-sumitomo-rd.com/haneda/shopping/about/
          - paragraph: MORE
    - heading "GUEST ROOM" [ref=e111] [level=3]
    - paragraph: Rooms
    - paragraph: Plenty of rooms available for families and groups Certified baby-friendly inn
    - button "Previous" [ref=e112]: ←Previous
    - tabpanel:
      - heading "Superior Queen" [ref=e113] [level=4]
      - paragraph: In addition to space to spread out your suitcase, a large sofa and a custom-made Simmons bed provide a comfortable stay.

        - /url: https://www.hvf.jp/eng/hanedaairport-grand/room_double2.html
        - paragraph: MORE
    - tabpanel:
